projects.title: 90 Degree Studios
projects.description: Working in Objective-C, my first app 'MessageBoard 21' trended #211 on Mac AppStore under Lifestyle category. Available on iPhone, iPad, Mac, and AppleTV.

projects.title: Social Computing and Algorithmic Expressions Laboratory
projects.description: I worked on creating a full-stack web application for our vendor, PesaCheck. Using React.js and Node.js, we created a fact-checking interface to help Kenyan election officials to track and monitor misinformation.

projects.title: Apple
projects.description: As a software Engineer at Apple, I worked on the Environmental Supply Chain Initiative creating data pipelines for feeding data, a fullstack web applicaiton for auditing and parsing through material specifications, and synthetic data generation.

image.alt: Apple Environmental supply chain initiative pledge

projects.title: Apple
projects.description: I was assigned to the macOS/coreOS team working on different accessibility tools for macOS using Swift, Objective-C, and Node.js.

projects.title: PayPal
projects.description: Working at PayPal, I worked on assigned tickets for the payment security of PayPal, using React.js, Next.js, node.js, and Express.

projects.title: Microsoft
projects.description: At Microsoft, I worked on the window's security team and system security hardening guidelines on the integrity and performance of Windows 10.
